channel.title: BashQuoter
channel.description:
[quote="AMERIKA"]The BashQuoter Program by AMERIKA! A simple program that connects to Bash.org, and gets the quotes without you opening a single browser! Just download the program from the link below. If you find any issues, besides with colours, then please tell me. Enjoy! Link: http://csysonline.net/files/BashQuoter.jar [i]Note: Source is in the jar[/i] [b]EDIT[/b]: I noticed while using this that I forgot to parse out [i]"[/i], which means you will see that instead of the [i]"[/i]/[/quote] He wanted me to post this
(08:00:11 PM) zн: So you want me to post your bashquoter on mopar? (08:00:28 PM) Amerika: yea
[b]100% Credit to Amerika 0 Credit to me.[/b]

item.title: BashQuoter
item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

[quote=“AMERIKA”]The BashQuoter Program by AMERIKA!

A simple program that connects to Bash.org, and gets the quotes without you opening a single browser! Just download the program from the link below. If you find any issues, besides with colours, then please tell me.

Enjoy!

Link: http://csysonline.net/files/BashQuoter.jar

Note: Source is in the jar

EDIT: I noticed while using this that I forgot to parse out ", which means you will see that instead of the "/[/quote]

He wanted me to post this

(08:00:11 PM) zн: So you want me to post your bashquoter on mopar? (08:00:28 PM) Amerika: yea

100% Credit to Amerika
0 Credit to me.

Read full topic
